google_play_reviews.content: add more ship and planet, and make controler easy
This game is fun and well-made. I feel like it could use another star system or two, but I've enjoyed it nonetheless

This game is pretty awesome, being an open source game, I would love to see some more content added to this game, or even a game stemming from this, as you cant find something like this around as often as say games with IAP's and ad galore, for being as small as it is, it is a good time killer, hope to see this game updated in the future! If not, then oh well, it is still a great game
realistic physics, well designed game, wish there were more content

Cool. But the mobile experience could be improved quite a lot, if only they added better controlling methods. Should not be too hard to add that d-pad -like aiming control and/or add the croshair somewhere there where the ship is pointing?(noscoping is hardüôà) At least currently, this game is much more enjoyable on PC.
great. just great.
This game works just like the pc version but if you want this game get it off steam it works well on low end pc's and its free to play.
With more content it would be epic

The game is really awesome I haven't seen any other mobile game like thisüëçüòÅ But it would be really nice if it could be possible to customize the position of the buttons and it would be awesome to af local wifi multiplayer it sometimes gets boring when you play alone other than that it's a great game
Highly underatted
Still good. Good on PC too.
Controls are so difficult! Please add an option to use computer's movement style!
I love the game, but if you could add Inertia Dampeners (Like on Space Engineers) that would be great. Other than that awesome game!
The controls are awful. So many weapons rely on holding down the fire key, so you have to use your fingertips. But, pretty ok.
Awesome. It would be cool if it was ONLINE!!!
Hard to control it's easy if there joystick.Why my mercenaries gone after I save the game and open it my mercenaries is gone.
Terrible e

This game is so good!! Could you plz consider multiplayer? At least up to 10 or 12 players? Multiplayer with maybe a carrier ship that we can buy would be cool too! That way if we hire mercenaries, we can store them until we need them to come out because I hired an army of mosquitoes, about 30 and even though I cleared 3 planets with them, they ended up killing themselves more then the enemy did. Overall this is a five star game and hopefully you consider putting the carrier in!!.
You did an awesome job making this game thanks!! :)
Great indie game

Amazingly fun,the graphic style is really good looking and all the types of hostile ships,piloting some of them and hireng them,aswell as the friendly ones make this game really entertaining. But i'd like to know if you are going to make a 3rd sistem and/or add more planets and/or controlable ships. If there was a new sistem,the game would be much better in my opinion!
Needs something like quests and an history just a wanna be developer advise if you do it the game will be complete

The game itself is good, I actually prefer it on a tablet to the steam version on laptop. People having issue with saves, if you 'dock' at a station in space, where the ship is automatically brought to a stop, the game will be saved at that point.   Couple of problems for me, themajor one being ships I 'hire' are not there when reloading a saved game, though credits and inventory all are. It would be good to see bigger universes, with more systems to explore. (Galaxies to maybe) I don't mind the fact each load is a different pair of systems, but 2 is quite limiting.  Controls are ok, I like the way the ship moves with no brake as such, and that it will keep moving till it crashes into something. Would give 5 stars if the 3 major problems above are changed.  Overall a fun little game, and easy to spend hours in it. Would give 5 stars if the 2 major problems above are changed.
Looks fun, but it won't  run on my Tab 4. Let me know when you add graphic options to the menu.
its good. please keep working on it cause it could be better still
Very difficult to play at all since you constantly keep drifting, there needs to be a control thay stabilizes the ship
It's a great adventure space game. What's really annoying is spending hours playing it when it may or may not save your progress to pick up playing later... It rarely saves any progress I make..
I'm looking forward for this game to be updated, It's an addicting game, Has unique gameplay and awesome physics...

A classic style reminiscent of star control 2 (ur Quan masters now on Androids) released on steam and improved by parts of its own community, good luck I hope people are still improving it, if there is, there's lots of room for growth in ways games like SC2, subspace and the like to be sources of inspiration for new mechanics and progression.
Why dont you add some more ships , items ,planets , enemies , and other to make the game more addictive game than others i like it but i feel its not enough to add please make it on other update
Love it. Only thing missing is reverse thrusters. That would make it so much better.
Love the all of the exploration!
The controls are awkward but otherwise great game
Would like it better if it had a save option. Every time I get ahead, I'm brought back to the beginning. A clear saving slot would be appreciated. I'll give a great review then.
Feel kinda guilty now paying for such a good game ..... The only heck is the control but meh this is a vacum so it floats.
I would love the game if it had a better way to be able to move and chase enemies

Simply makes a galaxy anew as you play next time, saves your ship and sometimes your load out depending what's left there in. Interesting ships and combinations and gravity and such explore find out. It has its quirks but I'd rather play space corsair right now makes me think.
GET.....THIS...GAME

Played this on Steam and it quickly grew to be my favorite  free game there. Smooth, but challenging gameplay.  Would like to see a traditional style "joystick" that these sort of games have. Also would be nice to have more ship types and items. Would be cool to make procedural generation in a game like this. 82/100
The best game in the world !
Nuf said
Please add more easier controls.  And More stuff

finally i found android open world space rpg game.i think everything well made....but the gui is glitching on my phone...when i boost my ship somehow the 'left' button pressing by 'itself'....please fix this

The game plays excellently but is not without flaw. The controls work well, but fixed weapons can be unwieldy. Zeroing may mitigate or even remove this issue. The game's continue button is hidden behind the new game option, which is somewhat misleading. This is an easy fix, just adding a continue to the mm. The universe does not persist. Every time you reload, its a new universe. Your ship/cash does persist however. Save states are highly recommended as a fix. The universe seems small, only two systems.
Dev, I'm sure if you'd take the time to address the control and bug issues this would be a very decent game
But I don't understand the save feature. When does my game save? I had the best ship with railguns and such, I saved, and when I came back it was like the first time I saved. Please fix or explain :/

The gameplay is great! And also I noticed you follow one of Newton's rule where once you move in space, you never stop. Cool ships and weapons. And please add some bigger ships and bigger ships that you can control and more enemies and solar systems and a part 2. The fact that this game has no missions nor storyline makes the game even a lot better because you get to choose what you want to do in this game. Good job on making this game and I wish for another one but with more enemies, ships, bigger ships, better graphics and overall, better gameplay, physics and no story.
Cant play on my android, tooooo laggy. Takes a good sixty seconds for something to happen after pressing a button =/ i can run any other game just fine. So this is pretty weird
Controls r gaaarbage unable to play
While I enjoyed the premise of the game the execution was flawed. The controls are "slippery" and it was very difficult to maintain precise maneuvering.
The game itself is awesome but has horrible controls, i found the game bugging on me and moving forward automatically. As well as having to much anti gravity.

I love this game. Takes just enough skill to play that it stays interesting, but not so much that it's impossible to have fun. The only down side is the lack of solar systems. We need more than two!!!!!!!
Horrible controls

This game is amazing I love how its open a "space"/world game. And its something new to me. but one think got to me 2 soler system but a void of space. When I flew out to empty space and kept going and going to the point of nothingness and I went out far to where my ship was nowhere seen on the map. And at that point I thought I would be in a other soler system with new,enemies and items. But overall its still a great I loved to see,more add to it
alright game. it could be better and have more depth and complexity but for a game that is free there arent even adds its completely free. its a good game that has more potential
A really nice 2D game i liked it alot
Sick spaceship game that's FREE. Literally no downside to this game.
Good game. Hasn't had an update in a long time.
Feels more at home on the PC, but still amazing
Twice in a row now, as I progressed through the game, fatal errors have occurred. Fix it.
Only difference is you don't have to pay 60$ for it.
No one dasint laik spais
Reached group size limit.
This is the greatest game I have ever played but none of my family can play becuse they all have iphones

This is a great game thats plauged by two things, horrible controls and no ability to save. The controls make combat impossible and the lack of a way to save your progress leaves you upset that you wasted your time shooting astroids.
I absulutly love it but what are the big boss looking ship suposed to do cause i think its an over powerd taxi
Brilliant game

1.new stuff ships weapons places etc.                                      2.automatic setspawn at last visited command post (sorry i didnt know thier name but its where we respawn) 3.accurate trade via inv from you to hired mercenary  4.movable map not just fixed on your position thankyou for listening i hope you implement some of these in the near future
I grabbed this on steam and I threw it on my phone. Great game and you cant argue with the price. This review will not change but the version does occasionally. Version updated again.
This game is awesome, expanding from the God Old Game of Atari Asteroid and incorporating additional content of Space Traders and FTL
This game is the best m8
Super game but I can't save world
At some point, the game doesn't save, fix please?
Please add more places and a way to store credits and weapons
I love this game so much, the lack of new content is beautiful and it works in nicely whenever I need to play something repetitive! Don't ever change this game!
amazing
I not the ship called the hunter (the 2k one) and I got soooo much money. But then I went poop and came back and my progress was gone! Please fix

Ok so ill admit it now the gameplay is awesome and the ideas are awesome. Its basicly just pure awesome. As i have been playing this game on both my pc and phone i noticed a prominant glitching through the map. This trap glitch is easily esaped just by relogging into the game. As i played and my ciblings envied me for playing this wonderful game (i joke) i wondered if i could make a Lan multiplayer you know like minecraft or any other co-op game. This would be awesome!!!!!
Its good...but it needs more stars, planets, ships, guns, goods, story, larger world, different races, less loadung time, and more variety in everything...thx for listening in advance...

I got anew ship and edited and there's no save button and my ship was gone when i got back on!
I hope more ship and planet would be coming soon or a way to mod it(because it can be modify on PC)

Please update so if you buy a ship you keep it and please add more guns and plant it  and new ship I love this game and the hunter is great love it this game is the bestüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
I love these types of games and I would wish more game makers would make game more like this one and this game is awesome. keep up the good work

Amazing

Can you update like choosing ship in new profile and can you make profile load and save and that can be useful and the enemy ship and friendly ship are eating money and stuff and when i die my stuff was eat by other and don't like my gang that loss that what i don't like it please update i give you 5 star

Nice make the starter ship so fast you can't control it
But in the next update you should add capital ships.

Quite fun, but I don't exactly like having to restart my game every time I turn on the app. Is this a glitch or just a feature of the game? I only ever get the option to pick "new game" then "previous ship" or "new ship", so I always lose any data. 5/5 once save works for me
Really excited to play this on my phone rather than my computer
This game is amazing! Sunk too much time into it, but totally worth it.
Would recommend to anyone who like s open world space adventure games. ALSO NO ADS OR IN APP PURCHASES.
Great game awesome gravity physics.... You should defintitly make it multiplayer

The loading times are horrendous and the game goes back to the main menu with the home button, forcing you to reload the game. It's a lifesaver for getting out of tight spots. Aside from that, this is a really neat game!
Laggy.

I personally think the controls are terrible. And that's the only thing I don't like about it. I think it should be a single stick for all movement so you are able to move controllably whilst shooting
When I have VanGuard it will not save

I wish there was more to do of course, I also wish you could choose a race of alien and then that race wouldn't attack you. I chose to be the brown aliens and tried to role play but they attacked me and I never felt at home. It would be cool if you could respond cx
More of a proof of concept than a complete game.  Shoot rocks to buy better weapons shoot ships to buy better weapons rinse repeat
I couldn't get the game to stop lagging

I have played this on Steam before, it's very good. And the developers listen to players & help with any problems. The developers are open to suggestions for the game or questions about the game too. This game has seamless transitions onto and off of planets, randomly generated systems, a good challenge, & you even get to blow up asteroids.   >:3
But please fix the glitches like getting stuck in the planet
Crash on start
Love it but need reverse thrust.
This game has so much development potential, you there should be a number 2 made, then add some new weapons, and some quests, planets and systems.
Also terrible controls
Fighter Ship is broken
Gun 2 and left overlap, half the text is missing, is this tablet only?

I love the game but I really hate this glitch. I only have this happen to me using the ship that was 2k. I forget the name of it. Some time when I am near the surface, I get forcefully sucked through the surface. I can not get out and remain trapped underground.
Its awesome but i lost my ship when i loaded back in
Everybody else already
More planets. More ship's. More more more!
Is really entertaining but, it really need to have a save option or point, you cannot close the game because  all the progress that you'd made will be erased until you buy a new ship.

This game is one of the best in space related themes, but, to improve it, you could add more ships and even have it possible to own space stations and control your scouts. You can also add many more star systems and more types of planets if possible.

Where the updates guys?! This game has SO much potential! I have it on pc and Android and the hand is great on both! You don't get that often! Keep it up! And keep the updates coming! It's been WAYY too long!
Every time I choose previous ship it just stars me over again.
Open world, old school arcade interstellar shoot em up. For free. With no in app purchases. What is this madness?

I had played the steam version before and loved it there, so now I got a new phone and I saw this, I was very surprised. I love the game and think it should be further expanded with missions and maybe some territorial stuff, with taking over planets. Keep up the great work, and keep it original.
dont work on touch
Played it first on Steam a few months ago. This game has a lot going for it.
I wish it would save my progress without losing my stuff
It really is the kind of game that you need to save and come back to. Takes too much time to just restart all the time
Just needs a little work. more ship variety, less frame rate drop when fighting more than one enemy at a time.
Please update soon! :) more space ships and guns :)... Suggestion: personal ship hangar to save items money and ships...

I love this, it's very fun but every now and then, no matter what I press my boosters will fire up and won't stop unless I press them again so I can't really do anything because when I press left or right, my boosters start up
SO LAGGY I UNINSTALLED IT WITHIN 4 MIN!!!!!!!
Good concept very fun but there is no real save. Not going to play until there is some kind of save.

These small little indie dev games always end up being the best. *Fantastic* game, AND no microtransactions? This must be what heaven's like... But seriously though, I would easily pay $10 on Steam for a more expanded version of what you have here. I want more! This game is incredible!
You should be able to set your spawn and keep your items if you die or have a storage system. Other rhan that COOLEST GAME EVER!!!
This is awesome, few bugs here and there but overall great. Is there any way to use/equip hired ships or is that under development?
It would be fun if there 1. was a story or anything like that and 2. need new ships because a Vanguard sucks on the ice planet and 3.better guns and mercenaries
This needs multiplayer and the ability to get out of your ship like when you land on a planet you can go out and then go back to your ship and when your in space you can go out to repair your ship
I think that this game is pretty good but every time I play 2 minutes after starting my sound stops completely until I relaunch the app. Also my world wont save pls fix and I will r8 5/5
I must say, it doesn't even compare to the PC version
but no real direction of what to do in the game. no goals besides upgrade... got boring real quick
Not changing 5 star raiting anytime soon

Love it
Great game
I really like this game but I would love to be able to save my progress
Very fun time killer and deep customizable ships.Really a great free game.
Would not launch.
A very fun game, reminds me of Solar Winds. Not much to do after a few hours. Can we have a ship with two light weapons and fire them both at once? Dual Blasters would be rad.
But can u add a zoom option please hard to play on mobile
Awesome game but maybe ad multiplayer for android but other wise it is a really fun open world game. Really though put multiplayer for android. That will even funner

Good game, quite enjoyable once you get used to the controls. But the bug where you get "sucked" into the planet surface is the biggest downside. I can't carry on a decent game without getting sucked in after a while, having to respawn and lose some stuff. Please fix it, it's very easy to get sucked into the planets.
Please add more stuff : ships, friends, enemies, more planets per solar system, and so on .
The planet kale, has a whole lot of glitches that suck your ship into the ground and you can't get out, please fix

I mean wow the graphics are splendid and the gameplay is awesome but i want to ask this. Will there ever be multiplayer mode or local and boss battles. And more star systems instead of 2 because i get bored since ive unlocked everything but im looking foward for these things to be added

No permissions, install.  Just loads, uninstall.  Rate.  3 step process and I beat the game.  Thanks to the comments, I imagine having a whole lot of fun.
It's a great game. I just can't save, I'm always stuck starting a new game. Please fix

Really dev's? No reverse thrust? No way to stop? You just whip through the galaxy praying you aren't going to fast or you spend time circling! I hope to gods by the time we hit space travel our engineer's are smarter then these guys. Sorry guys, your game kinda sucks.
